messages.message: 'setStats' is assigned a value but never used. Allowed unused vars must match /^_/u.

      icon: <CheckCircle sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: '#4caf50' }} />,
      color: '#4caf50',

title: 'Pending',

      icon: <Pending sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: '#ff9800' }} />,
      color: '#ff9800',

      icon: <Cancel sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: '#f44336' }} />,

'use client';

import { useEffect } from 'react';
import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
import { Container, Box, Typography, Paper, Grid, Card, CardContent, Button } from '@mui/material';
import { VerifiedUser, PictureAsPdf, CheckCircle } from '@mui/icons-material';

export default function HomePage() {
  const router = useRouter();

  useEffect(() => {
    // Remove auto-redirect - let users browse landing page
    // They can choose to login or apply
  }, [router]);

  const features = [
    {
      icon: <VerifiedUser sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: '#2196f3' }} />,
      title: 'à¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¹ƒà¸šà¸£à¸±à¸šà¸£à¸­à¸‡',
      description: 'à¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸‚à¸­à¹ƒà¸šà¸£à¸±à¸šà¸£à¸­à¸‡à¸¡à¸²à¸•à¸£à¸à¸²à¸™ GACP à¸­à¸­à¸™à¹„à¸¥à¸™à¹Œà¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸•à¸¥à¸­à¸” 24 à¸Šà¸±à¹ˆà¸§à¹‚à¸¡à¸‡'
    },
    {
      icon: <PictureAsPdf sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: '#2196f3' }} />,
      title: 'à¸­à¸±à¸›à¹‚à¸«à¸¥à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸à¸ªà¸²à¸£',
      description: 'à¹à¸™à¸šà¹€à¸­à¸à¸ªà¸²à¸£à¸›à¸£à¸°à¸à¸­à¸šà¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸­à¸¢à¹ˆà¸²à¸‡à¸›à¸¥à¸­à¸”à¸ à¸±à¸¢à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸ªà¸°à¸”à¸§à¸'
    },
    {
      icon: <CheckCircle sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: '#2196f3' }} />,
      title: 'à¸•à¸´à¸”à¸•à¸²à¸¡à¸ªà¸–à¸²à¸™à¸°',
      description: 'à¸•à¸£à¸§à¸ˆà¸ªà¸­à¸šà¸ªà¸–à¸²à¸™à¸°à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸„à¸§à¸²à¸¡à¸„à¸·à¸šà¸«à¸™à¹‰à¸²à¹à¸šà¸š Real-time'
    }
  ];

  return (
    <Box sx={{ minHeight: '100vh', bgcolor: '#f5f5f5' }}>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1976d2 0%, #2196f3 100%)',
          color: 'white',
          py: 12
        }}
      >
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Box textAlign="center">
            <Typography variant="h2" fontWeight={700} gutterBottom>
              ï¿½ à¸£à¸°à¸šà¸šà¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸‚à¸­à¹ƒà¸šà¸£à¸±à¸šà¸£à¸­à¸‡ GACP
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="h5" sx={{ mb: 4, opacity: 0.9 }}>
              à¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¹ƒà¸šà¸£à¸±à¸šà¸£à¸­à¸‡à¸¡à¸²à¸•à¸£à¸à¸²à¸™ GACP à¸­à¸­à¸™à¹„à¸¥à¸™à¹Œ à¸ªà¸°à¸”à¸§à¸ à¸£à¸§à¸”à¹€à¸£à¹‡à¸§ à¸›à¸¥à¸­à¸”à¸ à¸±à¸¢
            </Typography>
            <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2, justifyContent: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap' }}>
              <Button
                variant="contained"
                size="large"
                onClick={() => router.push('/application/new')}
                sx={{
                  bgcolor: 'white',
                  color: '#1976d2',
                  px: 6,
                  py: 2,
                  fontSize: '1.1rem',
                  fontWeight: 600,
                  '&:hover': {
                    bgcolor: '#f5f5f5'
                  }
                }}
              >
                à¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¹ƒà¸«à¸¡à¹ˆ
              </Button>
              <Button
                variant="outlined"
                size="large"
                onClick={() => router.push('/applications')}
                sx={{
                  borderColor: 'white',
                  color: 'white',
                  px: 6,
                  py: 2,
                  fontSize: '1.1rem',
                  fontWeight: 600,
                  '&:hover': {
                    borderColor: '#f5f5f5',
                    bgcolor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)'
                  }
                }}
              >
                à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸‰à¸±à¸™
              </Button>
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Features Section */}
      <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ py: 8 }}>
        <Typography variant="h3" fontWeight={700} textAlign="center" gutterBottom>
          à¸‚à¸±à¹‰à¸™à¸•à¸­à¸™à¸à¸²à¸£à¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="h6" textAlign="center" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mb: 6 }}>
          à¸£à¸°à¸šà¸šà¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸‚à¸­à¹ƒà¸šà¸£à¸±à¸šà¸£à¸­à¸‡à¸¡à¸²à¸•à¸£à¸à¸²à¸™ GACP à¸ªà¸°à¸”à¸§à¸ à¸£à¸§à¸”à¹€à¸£à¹‡à¸§
        </Typography>

        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          {features.map((feature, index) => (
            <Grid item xs={12} md={4} key={index}>
              <Card
                sx={{
                  height: '100%',
                  transition: 'transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s',
                  '&:hover': {
                    transform: 'translateY(-8px)',
                    boxShadow: 6
                  }
                }}
              >
                <CardContent sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 4 }}>
                  <Box sx={{ mb: 2 }}>{feature.icon}</Box>
                  <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight={600} gutterBottom>
                    {feature.title}
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                    {feature.description}
                  </Typography>
                </CardContent>
              </Card>
            </Grid>
          ))}
        </Grid>
      </Container>

      {/* Process Steps Section */}
      <Box sx={{ bgcolor: 'white', py: 8 }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Typography variant="h4" fontWeight={700} textAlign="center" gutterBottom>
            à¸‚à¸±à¹‰à¸™à¸•à¸­à¸™à¸à¸²à¸£à¸”à¸³à¹€à¸™à¸´à¸™à¸à¸²à¸£
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" textAlign="center" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mb: 6 }}>
            à¸•à¸±à¹‰à¸‡à¹à¸•à¹ˆà¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¸ˆà¸™à¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸£à¸±à¸šà¹ƒà¸šà¸£à¸±à¸šà¸£à¸­à¸‡
          </Typography>
          <Grid container spacing={3}>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Paper sx={{ p: 3 }}>
                <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight={600} color="primary" gutterBottom>
                  1ï¸âƒ£ à¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸Šà¸³à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                  à¸à¸£à¸­à¸à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸¡à¸¹à¸¥à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸­à¸±à¸›à¹‚à¸«à¸¥à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸à¸ªà¸²à¸£ à¸ˆà¸²à¸à¸™à¸±à¹‰à¸™à¸Šà¸³à¸£à¸°à¸„à¹ˆà¸²à¸˜à¸£à¸£à¸¡à¹€à¸™à¸µà¸¢à¸¡ 5,000 à¸šà¸²à¸—
                </Typography>
              </Paper>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Paper sx={{ p: 3 }}>
                <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight={600} color="primary" gutterBottom>
                  2ï¸âƒ£ à¸•à¸£à¸§à¸ˆà¸ªà¸­à¸šà¹€à¸­à¸à¸ªà¸²à¸£
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                  à¹€à¸ˆà¹‰à¸²à¸«à¸™à¹‰à¸²à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸•à¸£à¸§à¸ˆà¸ªà¸­à¸šà¸„à¸§à¸²à¸¡à¸–à¸¹à¸à¸•à¹‰à¸­à¸‡à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¹€à¸­à¸à¸ªà¸²à¸£ (à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¹€à¸§à¸¥à¸² 3-5 à¸§à¸±à¸™à¸—à¸³à¸à¸²à¸£)
                </Typography>
              </Paper>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Paper sx={{ p: 3 }}>
                <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight={600} color="primary" gutterBottom>
                  3ï¸âƒ£ à¸•à¸£à¸§à¸ˆà¸ªà¸­à¸šà¸ à¸²à¸„à¸ªà¸™à¸²à¸¡
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                  à¸Šà¸³à¸£à¸°à¸„à¹ˆà¸²à¸˜à¸£à¸£à¸¡à¹€à¸™à¸µà¸¢à¸¡ 25,000 à¸šà¸²à¸— à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸™à¸±à¸”à¸«à¸¡à¸²à¸¢à¸•à¸£à¸§à¸ˆà¸Ÿà¸²à¸£à¹Œà¸¡ à¸«à¸¥à¸±à¸‡à¸œà¹ˆà¸²à¸™à¸à¸²à¸£à¸•à¸£à¸§à¸ˆà¸ˆà¸°à¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸£à¸±à¸šà¹ƒà¸šà¸£à¸±à¸šà¸£à¸­à¸‡
                  GACP
                </Typography>
              </Paper>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Stats Section */}
      <Box sx={{ bgcolor: '#f5f5f5', py: 8 }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Grid container spacing={4} textAlign="center">
            <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
              <Typography variant="h3" fontWeight={700} color="primary">
                30,000 à¸¿
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="h6" color="text.secondary">
                à¸„à¹ˆà¸²à¸˜à¸£à¸£à¸¡à¹€à¸™à¸µà¸¢à¸¡à¸£à¸§à¸¡
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
                (à¸Šà¸³à¸£à¸° 2 à¸‡à¸§à¸”)
              </Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
              <Typography variant="h3" fontWeight={700} color="primary">
                14-21
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="h6" color="text.secondary">
                à¸§à¸±à¸™à¸—à¸³à¸à¸²à¸£
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
                (à¹‚à¸”à¸¢à¸›à¸£à¸°à¸¡à¸²à¸“)
              </Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
              <Typography variant="h3" fontWeight={700} color="primary">
                24/7
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="h6" color="text.secondary">
                à¸šà¸£à¸´à¸à¸²à¸£à¸­à¸­à¸™à¹„à¸¥à¸™à¹Œ
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
                (à¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸•à¸¥à¸­à¸”à¹€à¸§à¸¥à¸²)
              </Typography>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Footer */}
      <Box sx={{ bgcolor: '#1976d2', color: 'white', py: 4 }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Typography variant="body2" textAlign="center">
            Â© 2025 à¸£à¸°à¸šà¸šà¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸‚à¸­à¹ƒà¸šà¸£à¸±à¸šà¸£à¸­à¸‡ GACP - à¸à¸£à¸¡à¸§à¸´à¸Šà¸²à¸à¸²à¸£à¹€à¸à¸©à¸•à¸£
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" textAlign="center" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
            à¸ªà¸­à¸šà¸–à¸²à¸¡à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸¡à¸¹à¸¥à¹€à¸à¸´à¹ˆà¸¡à¹€à¸•à¸´à¸¡: à¹‚à¸—à¸£ 02-XXX-XXXX à¸«à¸£à¸·à¸­ Email: gacp@doa.go.th
          </Typography>
        </Container>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
}
